katrenko.ws
Class LearnModelServlet

java.lang.Object
  javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
          katrenko.ws.LearnModelServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
public class LearnModelServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet

Calls LearnModel web service which returns 10-fold cross-validation results on the input data and stores a model and its log file in the folder provided by a user. To run this client, use http://localhost:8080/LearnModel/learn

Note: do not forget to check whether Tomcat uses the same port as in String endpoint = "http://localhost:8080/axis/services/LearnModel";. Change it if needed.

See Also:
